ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes - it's essential for this material to be mastered in order to leave a skilled graduate student. Plan to spend a great deal of time on the course.
I would definitely recommend this course to a fellow student -- it is extremely useful.
Yes, I think this course was invaluable and I think it would be beneficial to students in other areas of psychology as well.
I believe a research methods course should be required for all psychology graduate students, and not just clinical students, since the material is crucial for our careers.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course helped me think more clearly and critically about research design, so it is relevant to virtually every domain of my discipline and research.
This course has greatly enhanced my understanding of and appreciation for research, as well as for clinical work and academia more broadly.

This course greatly aided in my ability to draw conclusions from studies, both mine and of others, as previously I was somewhat of an uninformed consumer of research. I just wish there was a sequel to this course or opportunity to further check our mastery of this material in the future.
